verses.verse: And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H569>Amraphel<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8152>Shinar,<s%> <S%H746>Arioch<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H495>Ellasar,<s%> <S%H3540>Chedorlaomer<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> and <S%H8413>Tidal<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H9074>Goiim,<s%>

[that] they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> with <S%H1298>Bera<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> and with <S%H1306>Birsha<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6017>Gomorrah,<s%> <S%H8134>Shinab<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H126>Admah,<s%> and <S%H8038>Shemeber<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6636>Zeboiim,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H9055>Bela<s%> (that is, <S%H6820>Zoar<s%>).
<S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H2266>came<s%> as <S%H2266>allies<s%> to the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7708>Siddim<s%> (that is, the <S%H4417>Salt<s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%>).

<S%H8147>Twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> they had <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H3540>Chedorlaomer,<s%> but the <S%H7969>thirteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> they <S%H4775>rebelled.<s%>

And in the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H3540>Chedorlaomer<s%> and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> that were with him, <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5221>defeated<s%> the <S%H7497>Rephaim<s%> in Ashteroth-karnaim and the <S%H2104>Zuzim<s%> in <S%H1990>Ham<s%> and the <S%H368>Emim<s%> in Shaveh-kiriathaim,
and the <S%H2752>Horites<s%> in their <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as El-paran, <S%H834>which<s%> is by the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

Then they <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to En-mishpat (that is, <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%>), and <S%H5221>conquered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7704>country<s%> of the <S%H6003>Amalekites,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in Hazazon-tamar.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H126>Admah<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6636>Zeboiim<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H9055>Bela<s%> (that is, <S%H6820>Zoar<s%>) <S%H3318>came<s%> out; and they <S%H6186>arrayed<s%> for <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H854>against<s%> them in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7708>Siddim,<s%>

<S%H854>against<s%> <S%H3540>Chedorlaomer<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam<s%> and <S%H8413>Tidal<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H9074>Goiim<s%> and <S%H569>Amraphel<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8152>Shinar<s%> and <S%H746>Arioch<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H495>Ellasar<s%> â€“ <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H854>against<s%> <S%H2568>five.<s%>

Now the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7708>Siddim<s%> was full of <S%H2564>tar<s%> <S%H875>pits;<s%> and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%> <S%H5127>fled,<s%> and they <S%H5307>fell<s%> into them. But those who <S%H7604>survived<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> to the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country.<s%>

Then they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7399>goods<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H400>food<s%> <S%H400>supply,<s%> and <S%H1980>departed.<s%>

And they also <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3876>Lot,<s%> Abram's <S%H1121>nephew,<s%> <S%H251><s%> and his <S%H7399>possessions<s%> and <S%H1980>departed,<s%> for he was <S%H3427>living<s%> in <S%H5467>Sodom.<s%>

Then a <S%H6412>fugitive<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> the <S%H5680>Hebrew.<s%> Now he was <S%H7931>living<s%> by the <S%H436>oaks<s%> of <S%H4471>Mamre<s%> the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H812>Eshcol<s%> and <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H6063>Aner,<s%> and <S%H1992>these<s%> were <S%H1167>allies<s%> <S%H1285><s%> with <S%H87>Abram.<s%>

And when <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that his <S%H251>relative<s%> had been <S%H7617>taken<s%> <S%H7617>captive,<s%> he <S%H9553>led<s%> out his <S%H2593>trained<s%> <S%H2593>men,<s%> <S%H3211>born<s%> in his <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8083>eighteen,<s%> <S%H6240><s%> and <S%H7291>went<s%> in <S%H7291>pursuit<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H1835>Dan.<s%>

And he <S%H2505>divided<s%> his forces <S%H5921>against<s%> them by <S%H3915>night,<s%> he and his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and <S%H5221>defeated<s%> them, and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> them as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H2327>Hobah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H8040>north<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus.<s%>

And he <S%H7725>brought<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7399>goods,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H7725>brought<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> his <S%H251>relative<s%> <S%H3876>Lot<s%> with his <S%H7399>possessions,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> the <S%H802>women,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Then <S%H310>after<s%> his <S%H7725>return<s%> from the <S%H5221>defeat<s%> of <S%H3540>Chedorlaomer<s%> and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were with him, the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out to <S%H7122>meet<s%> him at the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7740>Shaveh<s%> (that is, the King's <S%H6010>Valley<s%>).

And <S%H4442>Melchizedek<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8004>Salem<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> out <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H3196>wine;<s%> now he was a <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H9411>Most<s%> <S%H9411>High.<s%>

And he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1288>"Blessed<s%> be <S%H87>Abram<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H9411>Most<s%> <S%H9411>High,<s%> <S%H7069>Possessor<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth;<s%>

And <S%H1288>blessed<s%> be <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H9411>Most<s%> <S%H9411>High,<s%> <S%H834>Who<s%> has <S%H4042>delivered<s%> your <S%H6862>enemies<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>" And he <S%H5414>gave<s%> him a <S%H4643>tenth<s%> of <S%H3605>all.<s%>
And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H87>Abram,<s%> <S%H5414>"Give<s%> the <S%H5315>people<s%> to me and <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H7399>goods<s%> for yourself."

And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> "I have <S%H7311>sworn<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H9411>Most<s%> <S%H9411>High,<s%> <S%H7069>possessor<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth,<s%>

that I will not <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H2339>thread<s%> or a <S%H5275>sandal<s%> <S%H8288>thong<s%> or <S%H3605>anything<s%> that is yours, <S%H3808>lest<s%> you should <S%H559>say,<s%> 'I have <S%H6238>made<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H6238>rich.<s%>'

"I will take <S%H1107>nothing<s%> <S%H1107>except<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> the <S%H5288>young<s%> <S%H5288>men<s%> have <S%H398>eaten,<s%> and the <S%H2506>share<s%> of the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> with me, <S%H6063>Aner,<s%> <S%H812>Eshcol,<s%> and <S%H4471>Mamre;<s%> let them <S%H3947>take<s%> their <S%H2506>share.<s%>"
